mapper.select: select a.club_id ,b.user_id ,c.user_real_name ,c.phone ,d.club_name from user_detail a left join user_detail b on a.club_id=b.club_id left join user_info c on b.user_id=c.user_id left join club d on b.club_id = d.club_id where a.user_id = #{admin_id } and b.join_club_status = '1'

select a.club_id ,a.user_id ,c.user_real_name ,c.phone ,d.club_name from user_detail a left join user_info c on a.user_id=c.user_id left join club d on a.club_id = d.club_id where a.join_club_status = '1'
select club_name ,club_status from club where club_id = #{club_id } and is_delete = 0
